about_the_game:
Welcome to Baby Pygmy Hippo Zoo, where you step into the playful life of a cute pygmy hippo baby at the zoo! Savor your pumpkins, pose for selfies with tourists, and bask in endless affection, or embrace your mischievous side. Annoy zookeepers, wreak havoc around the zoo, bite visitors, steal their belongings, and even attempt a daring escape. Will you be the star attraction or the ultimate troublemaker? The choice is yours!

Gameplay

Take on daily zoo life with a mix of exploration, interaction, and sandbox-style freedom. Start your day with a hearty pumpkin snack, then decide how to spend your time. Will you mingle with visitors, pose for selfies, and earn rewards for being the cutest hippo on the block? Or will you unleash mayhem, biting tourists, stealing their items, and leaving destruction in your wake?

Explore the zoo, from lush enclosures to the bustling boba café, unlocking new areas as you run away from the zookeepers. Earn points for good behavior like entertaining visitors, but beware: your mischief meter might attract the zookeepers if you take it too far.

As you level up, unlock special abilities like sprinting, headbutting fences, or even crafting elaborate escape plans to leave the zoo behind.

Features

Sandbox Gameplay: The zoo is your playground—roam freely, interact with other animals, and discover secrets.
Dynamic Interaction: React to the crowd’s behavior, and see how the zookeepers respond to your choices.
Customization: Change your look with fun costumes and unlockable accessories. Who says hippos can’t wear sunglasses?
Escape Challenges: Ready to leave the zoo? Strategize your escape route while avoiding zookeeper traps and surveillance.
Mischief vs. Fame: Balance your reputation as the star attraction or the zoo’s biggest official mascot!

Don't forget to wishlist Moo Deng Simulator on Steam!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (M2 and M3) or Intel Core M
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: M1, M2, M3 Silicon Mac & ARM Supported
